title: Ranked 5 team looking for jungler only!
body:
Hello! I run an organised ranked 5s team and we're currently looking for a jungler.
You have to be plat V minimum in soloq to apply.
You must have Skype for communication.
Only people with good, willing attitudes to learn and improve as a team will be accepted.

We have been up to plat V before but we just relocated to a new team which is currently in gold 4 and climbing fast.
Everyone's really nice so we hope you are too! We are serious but hope to have fun and improve.

Add me in game if you're interested in applying!

IGN: Opia

replies.body:
Hi im a challenger jungler, previous accounts are santorin, xsmithie, reignover, bengi, cyanide, theoddone, rush, move etc < i got some other noob d1 accounts that arent important. 

I love improving, but im already perfect so any advice you give me is wrong because your just salty because im perfect... and dont need advice. If i lose its always my teams fault but im willing to carry and ignore all their mistakes as long as i get to tax lane.

I can also play mid sometimes, not my best role though, my names in korea for when i mid is faker/corn/dade. But i dont like playing there cause this godly jg called jouska always camps me
